title: Add comprehensive PR review agent for SkiaSharp
body:
**Description of Change**

Adds a comprehensive, specialized PR review agent tailored to SkiaSharp's three-layer architecture (C++, C API, C#) and memory management requirements. Based on dotnet/maui's PR reviewer (1,125 lines) and significantly expanded to 1,428 lines (127% of original) with SkiaSharp-specific focus.

**Key Features:**

- **Memory management focus**: Validates three pointer types (raw, owned, ref-counted) across layers
- **Cross-layer validation**: Ensures C++ → C API → C# consistency, exception safety at boundaries
- **Build integration**: Uses Cake build system (`externals-download`, `libs`, `tests` targets)
- **Documentation references**: Links to `AGENTS.md`, `design/memory-management.md`, path-specific instruction files
- **Review checklists**: Layer-specific criteria (P/Invoke correctness, `sk_ref_sp()` usage, disposal patterns)
- **Common issue detection**: Wrong pointer types, memory leaks, exceptions escaping C API, `IntPtr` in public APIs

**Comprehensive Coverage (1,428 lines):**

**Testing Guidelines (~400 lines):**
- Fetch PR changes workflow (preserving instruction files)
- Merge failure handling with templates
- Setup test environment (native + managed builds)
- Build and deploy procedures with platform-specific commands
- Success verification (5-point checklist)
- Test WITH and WITHOUT PR changes (baseline comparison)
- Include test results in review with examples
- Edge case discovery (memory, error handling, platform, API)
- Cleanup procedures

**Review Process (~350 lines):**
1. Initial PR Assessment (scope, layers, platforms affected)
2. Deep Code Analysis (with shallow vs deep review examples)
3. Test Coverage Review (unit, memory, platform-specific, samples)
4. Breaking Changes & API Review (public API, C API, ABI compatibility)
5. Documentation Review (XML docs, code comments, design docs, samples)
6. Generated Code Review (generator modification workflow)
7. Platform-Specific Considerations (all 8+ platforms: Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, Android, WASM, etc.)
8. Native Code Review (building, testing, ABI compatibility)

**Providing Feedback (~200 lines):**
- Tone and style guidelines
- Feedback categories (Critical 🔴, Suggestions 🟡, Nitpicks 💡)
- Review comment template with full examples
- PR approval checklist (30+ items)
- Special considerations:
  - First-time contributors (welcoming, educational)
  - Complex changes (thorough testing, breaking down feedback)
  - Bot/automated PRs (verification, pattern checking)
  - Documentation-only PRs (accuracy, testing examples)

**SkiaSharp-Specific Sections:**
- Three-layer architecture validation with layer-specific checklists
- Memory management deep dive (pointer types, disposal, ref counting)
- Error handling patterns across layers
- Testing standards (memory, lifecycle, cross-layer)
- Generated code workflow
- Build system (Cake commands, native builds)
- Platform-specific considerations
- Native interop (P/Invoke, exception safety, ownership)

**Complete Coverage:**
- ✅ Interop (P/Invoke, exception safety, ownership, ABI, structure packing)
- ✅ Testing (unit, memory, platform, samples, iteration, WITH/WITHOUT comparison)
- ✅ Samples (testing procedures, best practices, documentation)
- ✅ Platforms (all 8+ platforms with specific requirements)
- ✅ Docs (XML docs, design docs, samples, README, migration guides)
- ✅ Native code (building, testing, 20+ min build warnings)
- ✅ Iteration (baseline comparison, edge cases, stress tests with 10,000 iteration examples)

The agent exceeds MAUI reviewer's thoroughness while maintaining SkiaSharp-specific focus on memory management, cross-layer consistency, and native interop. It provides step-by-step workflows with exact commands, code examples, and educational guidance for contributors.

**Bugs Fixed**

None.

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

**Required skia PR**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [x] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [x] Rebased on top of main at time of PR
- [ ] Merged related skia PRs
- [x] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [x] Updated documentation
